title:
Blowing-up solutions of Klein-Gordon equations with gauge variant
  semilinear terms in Friedmann-Lema\'itre-Robertson-Walker spacetimes under
  finite speed of propagation
abstract:
Blowing-up solutions of Klein-Gordon equations with gauge variant semilinear
terms are considered in Friedmann-Lema\'itre-Robertson-Walker spacetimes.
Effects of spatial expansion or contraction on the solutions are studied
through the scale-function and the curved mass.
